#summary How to create a new Eclipse project from the Google Code repository.

= Prerequisites =

  * The Eclipse IDE (http://www.eclipse.org/)
  * The MUPE plug-in
Help -> Software updates -> Available Software -> Add Site... -> 
http://www.cs.tut.fi/~momupe/MupeTools -> Install... -> ...
  * The Subclipse plug-in
The install/update URL is http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

= Checking out the project from the repository =

Follow this guide http://open.ncsu.edu/se/tutorials/subclipse/index.html, namely http://open.ncsu.edu/se/tutorials/subclipse/index.html#section6_0.

You'll find our repository URL here http://code.google.com/p/pielinen/source/checkout.

I use:
URL: https://pielinen.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
Username: fsedlak
Password: Find out your generated password here - http://code.google.com/hosting/settings
